narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Baby.com Mhip is a Case Management provider based in Westland, MI. From 2018-01 through 2018-10, this provider received $183K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 2.6× the national median for 99402 (99402), at $83 per claim vs. the median of $32, placing them above the 90th percentile.
85% of billing is concentrated in 99402 (99402), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2018-10, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This provider appears to operate as a fiscal intermediary or management organization, processing payments on behalf of many individual caregivers. High aggregate billing is expected for this type of entity.
